references.paper_title: QSGD: Communication-efficient SGD via gradient quantization and encoding
references.reason: This paper introduces QSGD, a foundational work in communication-efficient distributed SGD, which is frequently compared to the proposed Shadowheart SGD.

references.paper_title: Lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization
references.reason: This paper provides lower bounds for non-convex stochastic optimization, which are crucial for evaluating the optimality of the proposed Shadowheart SGD.

references.paper_title: Better theory for SGD in the nonconvex world
references.reason: This paper offers improved theoretical analysis for SGD in non-convex settings, relevant to the theoretical foundation and comparisons made for Shadowheart SGD.

references.paper_title: Lower bounds for finding stationary points i
references.reason: This paper establishes lower bounds for finding stationary points, providing a benchmark for the optimality claims of Shadowheart SGD.

references.paper_title: Optimal time complexities of parallel stochastic optimization methods under a fixed computation model
references.reason: This paper presents optimal time complexities for parallel stochastic optimization, forming the basis for the optimality claims of the Shadowheart SGD method.
